list.name: SUPER-BOUNCY
list.description: Rico's bullets, from attack and Super alike, get Supercharged by their first bounce and deal +x damage!
list.descriptionHtml: Rico's bullets, from attack and Super alike, get Supercharged by their first bounce and deal +x damage!

list.name: ROBO-RETREAT
list.description: When Rico falls below x% health, he runs x% faster!
list.descriptionHtml: When Rico falls below x% health, he runs x% faster!
